title: HTML Foundations & Semantic Structure
summary: Built the foundation of the 'About Me' project with semantic HTML elements and clear structure.
details: Learned to use semantic HTML tags for better accessibility and SEO. Organized layout with <header>, <nav>, <main>, and <footer>. Added headings, paragraphs, and navigation links with proper indentation.

title: CSS Fundamentals
summary: Added styling to the project using CSS variables, layout properties, and responsive design basics.
details: Implemented CSS variables for colors and shadows. Applied flexbox for layout alignment. Introduced consistent typography and spacing. Prepared for light and dark themes by planning variable overrides.

title: Dark Mode Implementation
summary: Introduced light/dark mode theme switching with CSS variables.
details: Added `.dark-mode` class to <body> to swap CSS variable values. Used JavaScript to toggle themes. Ensured smooth transitions between modes using `transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out`.

title: Responsive Navbar & Layout
summary: Made navbar and layout adapt to mobile screens.
details: Used media queries to stack navbar items vertically on small screens. Adjusted paddings, margins, and button sizes for better mobile usability.

title: Button Styling & Info Toggle
summary: Enhanced dark mode and info toggle buttons for better UI/UX.
details: Applied custom hover effects, focus outlines, and shadows to buttons. Added ARIA attributes for accessibility. Implemented 'More Info' toggle to reveal hidden content.

title: CSS Cleanup & Theme Refinement
summary: Cleaned up CSS variables and improved theme contrast.
details: Grouped light and dark theme variables. Ensured consistent shadows, borders, and hover states. Reduced redundancy in color declarations.

title: JavaScript Modularization
summary: Moved inline JavaScript to external `main.js` file.
details: Separated HTML and JavaScript for cleaner code. Wrapped logic inside `DOMContentLoaded` to ensure DOM elements are loaded before event binding.

title: Cleanup & Understanding
summary: Removed extra UI experiments and reverted to clean, stable layout.
details: Eliminated unnecessary tabbed/modal interfaces. Kept dark mode and info toggle as the only interactive features for simplicity.

title: Modal Window Planning
summary: Planned modal windows for notes/resources display.
details: Explored modal vs tabbed UI in terms of UX and technical complexity. Focused on accessibility — focus trap, keyboard navigation.

title: Projects Section Starter
summary: Created starter HTML/CSS for Projects section.
details: Added new section layout for showcasing projects with responsive grid. Styled cards with hover effects.

title: Research — Benign Malware & UCM
summary: Studied benign-looking malware and uniform circular motion.
details: Learned about research-oriented, non-destructive malware. Reviewed equations and concepts for uniform circular motion in physics.

title: Journal Enhancements
summary: Made journal sections reusable and interactive.
details: Added tagging and filtering, jump links in navbar, collapsible 'Read More' details, and learning resources under each entry.

title: Cybersecurity Section Structure
details: Prepared reusable card layout for cybersecurity notes and case studies.

title: Feature Planning — Search & Dynamic Content
summary: Planned search, filtering, and JSON-based content loading.
details: Outlined features like reusable components, animations on scroll, and theme persistence with localStorage.

title: Study — SQL Injection vs XSS
summary: Compared SQL Injection and Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
details: Learned differences, attack vectors, and prevention methods for both vulnerabilities.

title: Journal Data Structure
summary: Created JSON format for journal entries and dynamic rendering setup.
details: Structured `journal.json` with title, summary, tags, and resources. Linked it to rendering functions in JavaScript.

title: Search Bar Implementation
summary: Added live search for Projects and Journal sections.
details: Implemented case-insensitive search filtering based on tags and content text.

title: Dynamic Journal Rendering
summary: Rendered journal entries dynamically from JSON with animations.
details: Used `fetch` to load entries and applied fade-in animation on render. Cleaned up rendering function for maintainability.
